answers.text:
Hi Craig,
Unfortunately we do not have any specific information on fast tracking entitlements but we do have a document on entitlements and economic development that you may find useful. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/102102
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Craig Failor
text: Are there any communities working on or have established a process for fast tracking entitlements?
title: Economic Development - fast tracking entitlements
